page.title: 15Lack of open space in Stoke
page.content: Some parents came into school one afternoon to talk to us about living in Stoke.One question we asked them was, "Do you think there are enough open spaces?"Most of the mums had young children and they told us that they would like more space for the children to play on.They said that it was not safe for the children to play near the roads. We said that we would like more space because it is difficult to play football in the street.There is a small piece of wasteland by the adventure playground but dogs foul it and there is often broken glass on it. Throughout the area studied by the three schools,it became clear that there were small areas available for the children to play on.However many of these were overgrown and not fenced off from the road or littered and fouled.
